æè¿°

è¶…æ–‡æœ¬ä¼ è¾“åè®®å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼ˆæœ‰æ—¶ç§°ä¸ºâ€œç”¨æˆ·ä»£ç†â€ï¼‰ã€‚ç”¨äºå‘å‡º HTTP è¯·æ±‚ä»¥ä¸‹è½½ç½‘ç»œå†…å®¹ï¼Œä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶å’Œå…¶ä»–æ•°æ®æˆ–ä¸å„ç§æœåŠ¡é€šä¿¡ï¼Œä»¥åŠå…¶ä»–ç”¨ä¾‹ã€‚

è¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`HTTPRequest<class_HTTPRequest>` èŠ‚ç‚¹ä»¥è·å–æ›´é«˜çº§åˆ«çš„æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ è¿™ä¸ªå®¢æˆ·ç«¯åªéœ€è¦è¿æ¥ä¸€ä¸ªä¸»æœºä¸€æ¬¡ï¼ˆè§\ :ref:`connect_to_host<class_HTTPClient_method_connect_to_host>`\ ï¼‰ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥å‘é€å¤šä¸ªè¯·æ±‚ã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ URL çš„æ–¹æ³•é€šå¸¸åªä½¿ç”¨ä¸»æœºåé¢çš„éƒ¨åˆ†è€Œä¸æ˜¯å®Œæ•´çš„ URLï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å·²ç»è¿æ¥åˆ°ä¸»æœºã€‚è¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`request<class_HTTPClient_method_request>` ä»¥è·å–å®Œæ•´ç¤ºä¾‹å¹¶å¼€å§‹ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

\ **HTTPClient** åº”è¯¥åœ¨å¤šä¸ªè¯·æ±‚ä¹‹é—´é‡ç”¨æˆ–è¿æ¥åˆ°ä¸åŒçš„ä¸»æœºï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ã€‚æ”¯æŒä¼ è¾“å±‚å®‰å…¨ (TLS)ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬æœåŠ¡å™¨è¯ä¹¦éªŒè¯ã€‚2xx èŒƒå›´å†…çš„ HTTP çŠ¶æ€ä»£ç è¡¨ç¤ºæˆåŠŸï¼Œ3xx è¡¨ç¤ºé‡å®šå‘ï¼ˆå³â€œå†è¯•ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œä½†åœ¨è¿™é‡Œâ€ï¼‰ï¼Œ4xx è¡¨ç¤ºè¯·æ±‚æœ‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œ5xx è¡¨ç¤ºæœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯å‡ºäº†é—®é¢˜ã€‚

æœ‰å…³ HTTP çš„æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜… `MDN ä¸Š HTTP çš„æ–‡æ¡£ <https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP>`__\ ï¼ˆæˆ–é˜…è¯» `RFC 2616 <https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616>`__\ ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä»æ ¹æºäº†è§£ï¼‰ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¯¼å‡ºåˆ° Android æ—¶ï¼Œåœ¨å¯¼å‡ºé¡¹ç›®æˆ–ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€é”®éƒ¨ç½²å‰ï¼Œè¯·ç¡®ä¿åœ¨ Android å¯¼å‡ºé¢„è®¾ä¸­å¯ç”¨ ``INTERNET`` æƒé™ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œä»»ä½•ç±»å‹çš„ç½‘ç»œé€šä¿¡éƒ½å°†è¢« Android é˜»æ­¢ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨ä¼ è¾“åŠ å¯†ï¼ˆTLSï¼‰å¹¶é¿å…åœ¨ HTTP GET URL å‚æ•°ä¸­å‘é€æ•æ„Ÿä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ç™»å½•å‡­æ®ï¼‰ã€‚è€ƒè™‘æ”¹ç”¨ HTTP POST è¯·æ±‚æˆ– HTTP æ ‡å¤´æ¥è·å–æ­¤ç±»ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å½“ä»å¯¼å‡ºåˆ° Web çš„é¡¹ç›®æ‰§è¡Œ HTTP è¯·æ±‚æ—¶ï¼Œè¯·è®°ä½ï¼Œç”±äº `CORS <https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CORS>`__\ ï¼Œè¿œç¨‹æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯èƒ½ä¸å…è®¸æ¥è‡ªç«™å¤–çš„è¯·æ±‚ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‰˜ç®¡åˆ°æœ‰é—®é¢˜çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œåº”è¯¥ä¿®æ”¹å…¶åå°ï¼Œä»¥é€šè¿‡æ·»åŠ  ``Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *`` HTTP æ ‡å¤´æ¥å…è®¸æ¥è‡ªç«™å¤–çš„è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ TLS æ”¯æŒç›®å‰ä»…é™äº TLS 1.0ã€TLS 1.1 å’Œ TLS 1.2ã€‚å°è¯•è¿æ¥åˆ°ä»…æ”¯æŒ TLS 1.3 çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨æ—¶å°†è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯ã€‚

\ **è­¦å‘Šï¼š**\ ç›®å‰ä¸æ”¯æŒ TLS è¯ä¹¦æ’¤é”€å’Œè¯ä¹¦ç»‘å®šã€‚åªè¦åŠé”€çš„è¯ä¹¦åœ¨å…¶ä»–æ–¹é¢æœ‰æ•ˆï¼Œå°±ä¼šè¢«æ¥å—ã€‚å¦‚æœè¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œä½ å¯èƒ½å¸Œæœ›ä½¿ç”¨æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸè¾ƒçŸ­çš„è‡ªåŠ¨ç®¡ç†çš„è¯ä¹¦ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

:ref:`ResponseCode<enum_HTTPClient_ResponseCode>` **RESPONSE_ACCEPTED** = ``202``

HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç  ``202 Accepted``\ ã€‚è¯·æ±‚å·²æ”¶åˆ°ï¼Œä½†å°šæœªå¤„ç†ã€‚HTTP åè®®ä¸­æ— æ³•å®ç°åœ¨å®Œæˆå¯¹è¯·æ±‚çš„å¤„ç†åå¼‚æ­¥åœ°æŠŠè¯·æ±‚å‘å›æ¥ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªå“åº”çš„ä½¿ç”¨åœºæ™¯åº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¼šæœ‰å…¶ä»–è¿›ç¨‹æˆ–è€…æœåŠ¡å™¨å»å¤„ç†è¿™ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä¼šè¿›è¡Œæ‰¹é‡å¤„ç†ã€‚

.. _class_HTTPClient_constant_RESPONSE_NON_AUTHORITATIVE_INFORMATION:

.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

:ref:`ResponseCode<enum_HTTPClient_ResponseCode>` **RESPONSE_NON_AUTHORITATIVE_INFORMATION** = ``203``

HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç  ``203 Non-Authoritative Information``\ ã€‚è¯¥å“åº”çŠ¶æ€ç è¡¨ç¤ºè¿”å›çš„å…ƒæ¶ˆæ¯ä¸åŸå§‹æœåŠ¡å™¨æ‰€è¿”å›çš„ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ä»æœ¬åœ°æˆ–è€…ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹å‰¯æœ¬ä¸­æ”¶é›†è€Œæ¥ã€‚é™¤äº†ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µï¼Œåº”è¯¥ä¼˜å…ˆé€‰ç”¨ 200 OK å“åº”æ‰€è¿”å›çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚

.. _class_HTTPClient_constant_RESPONSE_NO_CONTENT:

.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç  ``204 No Content``\ ã€‚æœ¬è¯·æ±‚æ— å“åº”å†…å®¹ï¼Œä½†æŠ¥å¤´å¯èƒ½æœ‰ç”¨ã€‚ç”¨æˆ·ä»£ç†å¯èƒ½ä¼šæ ¹æ®è¯¥èµ„æºæ›´æ–°ç¼“å­˜æŠ¥å¤´ã€‚

HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç  ``205 Reset Content``\ ã€‚æœåŠ¡å™¨å·²å®Œæˆå¯¹è¯·æ±‚çš„å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¹¶è¦æ±‚å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å°†å¯¼è‡´è¯¥è¯·æ±‚çš„â€œæ–‡æ¡£è§†å›¾â€é‡ç½®å›åŸå§‹çŠ¶æ€ã€‚

.. _class_HTTPClient_constant_RESPONSE_USE_PROXY:

.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

:ref:`ResponseCode<enum_HTTPClient_ResponseCode>` **RESPONSE_USE_PROXY** = ``305``

**å·²å¼ƒç”¨ï¼š** Many clients ignore this response code for security reasons. It is also deprecated by the HTTP standard.

HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç  ``305 Use Proxy``\ ã€‚

.. _class_HTTPClient_constant_RESPONSE_REQUESTED_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE:

.. _class_HTTPClient_constant_RESPONSE_EXPECTATION_FAILED:

.. _class_HTTPClient_constant_RESPONSE_IM_A_TEAPOT:

.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

:ref:`ResponseCode<enum_HTTPClient_ResponseCode>` **RESPONSE_IM_A_TEAPOT** = ``418``

HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç  ``418 I'm A Teapot``\ ã€‚æƒ³è¦å°è¯•ç”¨èŒ¶å£¶ç…®å’–å•¡å°±ä¼šå¾—åˆ°é”™è¯¯ç â€œ418 å› ä¸ºæˆ‘æ˜¯ä¸ªèŒ¶å£¶â€ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°çš„å®ä½“å¤§æ¦‚åˆçŸ®åˆèƒ–ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªé”™è¯¯æ˜¯å¯¹1998å¹´æ„šäººèŠ‚ç©ç¬‘çš„è¶…æ–‡æœ¬å’–å•¡å£¶æ§åˆ¶åè®®çš„å¼•ç”¨ã€‚

.. _class_HTTPClient_constant_RESPONSE_MISDIRECTED_REQUEST:

.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

:ref:`ResponseCode<enum_HTTPClient_ResponseCode>` **RESPONSE_MISDIRECTED_REQUEST** = ``421``

HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç  ``421 Misdirected Request``\ ã€‚è¯·æ±‚è¢«é‡å®šå‘åˆ°äº†ä¸€å°æ— æ³•ç”Ÿæˆå“åº”çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚å¦‚æœä¸€å°æœåŠ¡å™¨æ²¡æœ‰é’ˆå¯¹è¯·æ±‚ URI çš„åè®®ç±»å‹å’Œä¸»æœºèº«ä»½é…ç½®å“åº”ï¼Œå°±æœ‰å¯èƒ½è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªä»£ç ã€‚

.. _class_HTTPClient_constant_RESPONSE_UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY:

.. rst-class:: classref-enumeration-constant

:ref:`ResponseCode<enum_HTTPClient_ResponseCode>` **RESPONSE_UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY** = ``422``

HTTP çŠ¶æ€ç  ``422 Unprocessable Entity``\ ï¼ˆWebDAVï¼‰ã€‚æœåŠ¡å™¨èƒ½å¤Ÿç†è§£è¯·æ±‚å®ä½“çš„å†…å®¹ç±»å‹ï¼ˆæ‰€ä»¥ä¸é€‚ç”¨ 415 Unsupported Media Type çŠ¶æ€ç ï¼‰ï¼Œè¯·æ±‚å®ä½“çš„è¯­æ³•ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æ­£ç¡®çš„ï¼ˆæ‰€ä»¥ä¸é€‚ç”¨ 400 Bad Request çŠ¶æ€ç ï¼‰ï¼Œä½†ä»ç„¶æ— æ³•æ‰§è¡Œè¯·æ±‚ä¸­æ‰€åŒ…å«çš„æŒ‡ä»¤ã€‚

è¿æ¥åˆ°ä¸»æœºã€‚è¿™éœ€è¦åœ¨å‘é€ä»»ä½•è¯·æ±‚ä¹‹å‰å®Œæˆã€‚

å¦‚æœæœªæŒ‡å®š ``port``\ ï¼ˆæˆ–ä½¿ç”¨ ``-1``\ ï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ™è‡ªåŠ¨å°†å…¶è®¾ç½®ä¸º 80ï¼ˆç”¨äº HTTPï¼‰å’Œ 443ï¼ˆç”¨äº HTTPSï¼‰ã€‚å¯ä»¥ä¼ å…¥å¯é€‰çš„ ``tls_options`` å‚æ•°æ¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰å—ä¿¡ä»»çš„è¯ä¹¦é¢å‘æœºæ„ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨ HTTPS æ—¶çš„é€šç”¨åç§°éªŒè¯ã€‚è¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`TLSOptions.client<class_TLSOptions_method_client>` å’Œ :ref:`TLSOptions.client_unsafe<class_TLSOptions_method_client_unsafe>`\ ã€‚

\ **ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š**\

    {
        "content-length": 12,
        "Content-Type": "application/json; charset=UTF-8",

è°ƒç”¨æ­¤æ–¹æ³•æ‰èƒ½å¯¹è¯·æ±‚è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`get_status<class_HTTPClient_method_get_status>` è·å–æ£€æŸ¥ã€‚

.. _class_HTTPClient_method_query_string_from_dict:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`String<class_String>` **query_string_from_dict**\ (\ fields\: :ref:`Dictionary<class_Dictionary>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_HTTPClient_method_query_string_from_dict>`

ä»æä¾›çš„å­—å…¸ç”Ÿæˆ GET/POST application/x-www-form-urlencoded æ ·å¼çš„æŸ¥è¯¢å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var fields = {"username": "user", "password": "pass"}
    var query_string = http_client.query_string_from_dict(fields)
    # è¿”å› "username=user&password=pass"

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var fields = new Godot.Collections.Dictionary { { "username", "user" }, { "password", "pass" } };
    string queryString = httpClient.QueryStringFromDict(fields);
    // è¿”å› "username=user&password=pass"



æ­¤å¤–ï¼Œå¦‚æœé”®å…·æœ‰ ``null`` å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ä»…æ·»åŠ é”®æœ¬èº«ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ·»åŠ ç­‰å·å’Œå€¼ã€‚å¦‚æœè¯¥å€¼æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ï¼Œåˆ™æ·»åŠ è¯¥ç›¸åŒé”®ï¼Œä¸å…¶ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªå€¼ç»„æˆä¸€å¯¹ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var fields = {"single": 123, "not_valued": null, "multiple": [22, 33, 44]}
    var query_string = http_client.query_string_from_dict(fields)
    # è¿”å› "single=123&not_valued&multiple=22&multiple=33&multiple=44"

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var fields = new Godot.Collections.Dictionary
    {
        { "single", 123 },
        { "notValued", default },
        { "multiple", new Godot.Collections.Array { 22, 33, 44 } },
    };
    string queryString = httpClient.QueryStringFromDict(fields);
    // è¿”å› "single=123&not_valued&multiple=22&multiple=33&multiple=44"



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_HTTPClient_method_request:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Error<enum_@GlobalScope_Error>` **request**\ (\ method\: :ref:`Method<enum_HTTPClient_Method>`, url\: :ref:`String<class_String>`, headers\: :ref:`PackedStringArray<class_PackedStringArray>`, body\: :ref:`String<class_String>` = ""\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_HTTPClient_method_request>`

å‘è¿æ¥çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

URL å‚æ•°é€šå¸¸åªæ˜¯ä¸»æœºååé¢çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯¹äº ``https://somehost.com/index.php`` æ¥è¯´å°±æ˜¯ ``/index.php``\ ã€‚å½“å‘ HTTP ä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€è¯·æ±‚æ—¶ï¼Œå®ƒåº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç»å¯¹ URLã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`METHOD_OPTIONS<class_HTTPClient_constant_METHOD_OPTIONS>` è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œ\ ``*`` ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å…è®¸çš„ã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`METHOD_CONNECT<class_HTTPClient_constant_METHOD_CONNECT>` è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå®ƒåº”è¯¥æ˜¯æƒé™ç»„ä»¶ (``host:port``)ã€‚

Headers å‚æ•°æ˜¯ HTTP è¯·æ±‚çš„æŠ¥å¤´ã€‚æœ‰å…³å¯ç”¨çš„ HTTP æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`Method<enum_HTTPClient_Method>`\ ã€‚

è¦åˆ›å»ºå¸¦æœ‰æŸ¥è¯¢å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„ POST è¯·æ±‚ä»¥æ¨é€åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œè¯·æ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹æ“ä½œï¼š


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var fields = {"username" : "user", "password" : "pass"}
    var query_string = http_client.query_string_from_dict(fields)
    var headers = ["Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded", "Content-Length: " + str(query_string.length())]
    var result = http_client.request(http_client.METHOD_POST, "/index.php", headers, query_string)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var fields = new Godot.Collections.Dictionary { { "username", "user" }, { "password", "pass" } };
    string queryString = new HttpClient().QueryStringFromDict(fields);
    string[] headers = { "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded", $"Content-Length: {queryString.Length}" };
    var result = new HttpClient().Request(HttpClient.Method.Post, "index.php", headers, queryString);



\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¦‚æœ ``method`` æ˜¯ :ref:`METHOD_GET<class_HTTPClient_constant_METHOD_GET>`\ ï¼Œåˆ™å¿½ç•¥ ``body`` å‚æ•°ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯å› ä¸º GET æ–¹æ³•ä¸èƒ½åŒ…å«è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®ã€‚è§£å†³æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®ä½œä¸º URL ä¸­çš„æŸ¥è¯¢å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¼ é€’ã€‚æœ‰å…³ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œè¯·å‚è§ :ref:`String.uri_encode<class_String_method_uri_encode>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

å‘è¿æ¥çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

URL å‚æ•°é€šå¸¸åªæ˜¯ä¸»æœºååé¢çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯¹äº ``https://somehost.com/index.php`` æ¥è¯´å°±æ˜¯ ``/index.php``\ ã€‚å½“å‘ HTTP ä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘é€è¯·æ±‚æ—¶ï¼Œå®ƒåº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç»å¯¹ URLã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`METHOD_OPTIONS<class_HTTPClient_constant_METHOD_OPTIONS>` è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œ\ ``*`` ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å…è®¸çš„ã€‚å¯¹äº :ref:`METHOD_CONNECT<class_HTTPClient_constant_METHOD_CONNECT>` è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå®ƒåº”è¯¥æ˜¯æƒé™ç»„ä»¶ (``host:port``)ã€‚

Headers å‚æ•°æ˜¯ HTTP è¯·æ±‚çš„æŠ¥å¤´ã€‚æœ‰å…³å¯ç”¨çš„ HTTP æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`Method<enum_HTTPClient_Method>`\ ã€‚

è¯·æ±‚ä½“æ˜¯ä»¥å­—èŠ‚æ•°ç»„çš„å½¢å¼åŸæ ·å‘é€çš„ï¼Œä¸ä¼šè¿›è¡Œä»»ä½•å½¢å¼çš„ç¼–ç ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **set_http_proxy**\ (\ host\: :ref:`String<class_String>`, port\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_HTTPClient_method_set_http_proxy>`

è®¾ç½® HTTP è¯·æ±‚ä½¿ç”¨çš„ä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚

å¦‚æœ ``host`` ä¸ºç©ºæˆ–è€… ``port`` ä¸º -1ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šå–æ¶ˆè®¾ç½®ä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚

è®¾ç½® HTTPS è¯·æ±‚ä½¿ç”¨çš„ä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚

å¦‚æœ ``host`` ä¸ºç©ºæˆ–è€… ``port`` ä¸º -1ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šå–æ¶ˆè®¾ç½®ä»£ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚
